name: Fool
description: A jester or fool figure, representing new beginnings, innocence, and taking leaps of faith.

person: A naive or innocent individual starting a new journey
Someone making reckless or foolish decisions
creatureTrap: A harmless creature that appears threatening but is actually benign
A dangerous trap disguised as something innocent
place: A new territory or unexplored area full of possibilities
A dangerous cliff or precipice where one might fall
treasure: A simple item with unexpected magical properties
A cursed item that brings misfortune to the unwary
situation: The beginning of a new adventure or quest
A situation where hasty action leads to trouble
